channel.title: Please help ill reward great if you help

item.title: Please help ill reward great if you help
item.dc:creator: @DaNamesJake DaNamesJake
item.description:
@DaNamesJake wrote:

I had problems with compiler on windows 7 too but this worked for me: @echo off set programfiles="C:\Program Files (x86)\" set jdk=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_20 set javac=%jdk%\bin\javac.exe set java=%jdk%\bin\java.exe :menu cls title Venom's Compiler echo Please choose an option below echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To Run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :c cls title Venom's Compiler goto cjc :cjc %javac% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause goto menu :r set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server goto r2 :r2 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto rsinfo2) else (goto r3) :r3 if exist .\server.class (goto rsinfo) else (goto se) :r4 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :rsinfo cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r4 :rsinfo2 cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r5 :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. pause cls goto menu :e

It will also run your server, but be sure you change it to your jdk.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help ill reward great if you help

item.title: Please help ill reward great if you help
item.dc:creator: @BubbleScape_x BubbleScape x
item.description:
@BubbleScape_x wrote:

[quote=“ags god, post:1, topic:362063”]Okay I am making a 317 server with a windows 7 but the compiler doesnt work at the moment right now it is
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

It says cannot find specied path or whatever my java is C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe

Please help ill give staff or pay[/quote]After a LONGGGGGGG time of research, i found a fix for the problem. Heres a link to fix it: http://lmgtfy.com/?q=working+compiler+317

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tomzyy11 tomzyy11
item.description:
@tomzyy11 wrote:

[quote=“ags god, post:1, topic:362063”]Okay I am making a 317 server with a windows 7 but the compiler doesnt work at the moment right now it is
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

It says cannot find specied path or whatever my java is C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe

Please help ill give staff or pay[/quote]

Dude… look…
if exist “%programfiles (x86)%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles (x86)%\Java”)

Read full topic

item.title: Please help ill reward great if you help
item.dc:creator: @ags_god ags god
item.description:
@ags_god wrote:

Okay I am making a 317 server with a windows 7 but the compiler doesnt work at the moment right now it is
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

It says cannot find specied path or whatever my java is C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe

Please help ill give staff or pay

Read full topic
